bankAccount.questionTitle: Can I change which account my money is redeemed to?
bankAccount.answerHtml:
Your money is redeemed to your primary bank account. You can easily change the primary bank account whenever you want to. 

You can see your banks by pressing the 'BANK DETAILS' button below. 

Here's how to change your primary bank account:

1) Tapping on the three dots next to the bank name
2) Tap on 'Make Primary'
bankAccount.feedback: change bank account, change redeem bank, get money in different bank account, how to change

bankAccount.questionTitle: Can I invest using a credit/debit card?
bankAccount.answerHtml:
No, it is not possible to invest using credit/debit card on Groww.

SEBI rules say the investments should be made through verified bank accounts only. It is not possible to verify bank accounts when investments are made using a credit/debit card.

You can use the following options:

1. UPI apps (Google Pay, PhonePe, BHIM, etc)
2. Net banking
3. NEFT/RTGS/IMPS

bankAccount.questionTitle: How to add a bank account to Groww?
bankAccount.answerHtml:
You can do so by clicking the 'BANK DETAILS' button below. 

Then, tap on 'Add Another Bank' to add a new bank account.

If you already have another bank account added, you make it your primary account. Here's how to:

1) Tapping on the three dots next to the bank name
2) Tap on 'Make Primary'
bankAccount.feedback: update bank, new bank, adding bank

bankAccount.questionTitle: Why do I need to add a bank account?
bankAccount.answerHtml: Without adding a bank account, it is not possible to invest. As per government rules, money invested in mutual funds should be linked to a bank account so that it can be withdrawn and paid back.

growwAccount.answerHtml:
On app: you will find the option to change your PIN in the 'You' section.

On website: click on the profile in the right top corner and then, click on your name. You will see the option to change the PIN here.

growwAccount.questionTitle: How to change password on Groww?
growwAccount.answerHtml:
On app: you will find the option to change your password in the 'You' section.

On website: click on the profile in the right top corner and then, click on your name. You will see the option to change the password here.

Referral.answerHtml:
Here's how it works:

-Share the referral code with your friend
-When they invest more than Rs 2000, you will get a green card 
-A green card means you get a reward of Rs 100 at least
-1 in every 50 lucky referrals will win a bumper prize of Rs 10,000!
-Reward will be transferred to your Groww-linked bank account immediately using UPI 

Done!

You can see the progress of your referrals by pressing the 'GROWW REFERRALS' button below. 

Note: Groww referral works only on the app, not the website. Make sure the link you share is used to sign up.
Referral.feedback: mutual fund, funds, scheme, investment plan, mutual fund, funds, scheme, investment plan, buy, put money, put, portfolio, my funds, dashboard, my mutual funds, portfolio, my funds, dashboard, my mutual funds, non-groww, non groww, outside groww, follow, see

Referral.questionTitle: I did not get the Groww referral award.
Referral.answerHtml:
Please email us the following:

-Screenshot of the WhatsApp chat where you sent the referral code to your friend
-Your friend's mobile number

Note: Please send the same phone number your friend has registered on Groww.

Referral.questionTitle: I want to report an issue.
Referral.answerHtml: Please raise a ticket. We will help you with this matter.

Referral.questionTitle: Is Groww referral valid on the app only?
Referral.answerHtml:
Yes. You can refer people only over the app.

If your friend signs up and invests using the website, the referral won't be successful.
Referral.feedback: grow, platform, website, site, invite, friend, share

Referral.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
Referral.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

Referral.questionTitle: What is the eligibility to get Groww referral reward?
Referral.answerHtml:
Here are the eligibility criteria:

-Your own Groww account should be fully updated - including bank details
-Your friend must use the link shared by you to sign up
-Your friend must use the app, not the website to sign up and invest
-Your friend must invest Rs 2000 or more
